title: TestPKIAuthenticationPlugin NPE
description:
I see Jenkins failures for TestPKIAuthenticationPlugin.

SOLR-9401 we addressed a few scenarios but maybe there are some more cases where we run into this.

I'll upload logs from one such scenario for reference, but the test fails quite regularly . 

This link is still active https://builds.apache.org/job/Lucene-Solr-Tests-7.2/19/ and I've uploaded the logs from this test scenario for reference.
